channel.title: Hiding ip port
channel.description: how i can hide ip and port on client

item.title: Hiding ip port
item.dc:creator: @imukaszz imukaszz
item.description:
@imukaszz wrote:

[quote=“primadude, post:5, topic:250604”][quote author=imukaszz link=topic=330547.msg2583445#msg2583445 date=1229363232]

theres a search bar for a reason

There is this section for a reason.

how i can hide ip and port on client

Remove this in client.java:

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "@whi@Server IP: " + server + ((anInt1216 == 2) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j); j += 15;

k if i will remove but how i can set always to connect to one ip…
[/quote]

Search for:

public URL getCodeBase

Change the ’ “+server+” ’ to your Ip.[/quote] i can’t in client public URL getCodeBase[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 17, 2008, 05:13:52 am[/size][hr]omg some one…

Read full topic
